mapper.sql: id, uuid, name, pinyin, air, pm, create_user, DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS create_time, update_user, DATE_FORMAT( update_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS update_time
mapper.insert:
insert into t_city
uuid, name,
pinyin,
air,
pm,
create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time
#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{air,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{pm,jdbcType=INTEGER},

insert into t_city
uuid, name, pinyin, air, pm, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time
values
#{item.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.air,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.pm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STR_TO_DATE( #{item.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{item.updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STR_TO_DATE( #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
mapper.update:
update t_city
air = #{air,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pm = #{pm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time =STR_TO_DATE(#{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
